attributes.action: Stop Proposed Cuts To Disability Benefits and Pip Rates
attributes.additional_details: George Osborne has announced plans to reduce these benefits by 2019/2020
attributes.background: People with a Disability need more money not less, Those with Cancer may need to use more water or electricity for heating. Many people may need expensive equipment, or a different diet which costs more. Motability Cars are also being reviewed, and taken from some who really need their independance.
